channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: No 'respite' for exploits, flash loans or exit scams in 2023: Cybersecurity firm
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The industry is likely to see “further attempts from hackers targeting bridges in 2023," while users are urged to be warier of their private keys.

item.title: Crypto technology will shift towards 'steadier hands' in 2023: Circle CSO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Turmoil in the crypto sector in 2022 will see the tech change hands to "more regulated and established institutions," said Circle's chief strategy officer.

item.title: Final Fantasy creator reveals ‘aggressive investment’ in blockchain games
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The company behind the Final Fantasy franchise says blockchain games will be a major focus of its strategy going forward.

item.title: Models and fundamentals: Where will Bitcoin price go in 2023?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Richard Mason
item.description: The rapidly evolving cryptocurrency ecosystem is entering a new phase in 2023, with incoming regulations in the U.S. and European Union.

item.title: ‘Tracers in the Dark’ presents a fun crime story — and lesson in privacy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By J.W. Verret
item.description: Want to keep the government from snooping on your transactional history? Start studying the forensics of crime and privacy on the blockchain.

item.title: New year, same old troubles — The FTX saga continues in 2023: Law Decoded, Dec. 26-Jan. 2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Having been granted the opportunity to enjoy Christmas and the New Year with his family, former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried has very few reasons for optimism in 2023.

item.title: US lawmakers could consider stock trading ban in next session of Congress
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: All members of Congress are already required to report most investments in stocks and cryptocurrency, but many have pointed to potential conflicts of interest.

item.title: Defying expectations: After an uncertain year, DeFi has high hopes for 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arunkumar Krishnakumar
item.description: DeFi had several key moments through 2022, but how is it expected to evolve in 2023?

item.title: Price analysis 1/2: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The DXY has turned bearish and that could prove to be a boon for SPX, cryptocurrency and Bitcoin.

item.title: Italy approves 26% capital gains tax on cryptocurrencies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The Italian Senate approved the new tax rate for crypto trading as part of the budget legislation for 2023.

item.title: Cameron Winklevoss pens open letter to Barry Silbert about Gemini’s blocked funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Both sides are facing financial headwinds, and Gemini was sued last week over money locked in its Earn program.

item.title: Crypto exchange adoption boosts ENS registrations to over 2.2M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Ethereum Name Service rounded off 2022 with over 2.2 million ENS domains registered, helped in part by integrations with exchanges and industry participants.

item.title: Trouble brewing for the US: Two-thirds of TradFi expects a 2023 recession
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: According to recent research, major financial institutions tied to the Federal Reserve see the U.S. facing a “shallow” or “mild” recession in 2023.

item.title: Turkey to use blockchain-based digital identity for online public services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Hazal Orta
item.description: Shortly after its central bank completed its first CBDC tests, Turkey announced a blockchain-based digital identity application.

item.title: Dogecoin Foundation announces new fund for core developers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The Dogecoin Foundation allocated 5 million DOGE, which is around $360,000 at the time of writing, to the development of the ecosystem.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Alameda Research troubles predate FTX: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: SBF had claimed that the operations of FTX and Alameda were independent, but the recent lawsuit has revealed that both firms worked in conjecture from day one.

item.title: US will see new ‘inflation spike’ — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin starts 2023 with a whimper as volatility stays absent and BTC price tips favor fresh downside to come.

item.title: Bitcoin Core developer hack highlights self-custody risks: Community responds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A Twitter user pointed out that if a top Bitcoin developer can’t keep his wallet secure, then mass adoption is a pipe dream.

item.title: Hong Kong brokers line up for SFC approval ahead of new virtual asset trading legislation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Legislative Council of Hong Kong passed legislation that will soon open up virtual assets to retail investors, and local financial services are lining up for licensing approval.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin highlights what he’s bullish about for 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: The Ethereum co-founder expects to reach a new milestone for rollups this year.

item.title: Lido overtakes MakerDAO and now has the highest TVL in DeFi
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: A Nansen in December noted that Ether staking solutions had been in high demand since Ethereum’s shift to proof-of-stake.

item.title: $62M crypto stolen in Dec was the ‘lowest monthly figure’ in 2022: CertiK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: December proved to be the month with the least crypto stolen in 2022, although there were still 23 major incidents, according to CertiK.

item.title: Bitcoin core developer claims to have lost 200+ BTC in hack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: A Bitcoin OG and core developer Luke Dashjr claims his PGP key was compromised, resulting in virtually all his Bitcoin being stolen from him on Dec. 31.

item.title: Revoke your smart contract approvals ASAP, warns crypto investor
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: A Reddit user has warned of the potential dangers of unchecked smart contracts, advising the community to revoke approvals on a regular basis.

item.title: Crypto makes history in 2022: Five instances of governments embracing digital assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Even amid the market breakdown and repetitive public attacks on the industry, some of the officials found the courage to embrace the innovation.

item.title: SushiSwap CEO proposes new tokenomics for liquidity, decentralization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The new tokenomics intends to boost liquidity and decentralization in the platform, enabling SushiSwap to continue operations.

item.title: These 4 altcoins may attract buyers with Bitcoin stagnating
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin remains stuck in a tight range but LTC, APE, ICP and BIT are showing signs of starting a new up-move.

item.title: 3 ways crypto derivatives could evolve and impact the market in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Derivatives played a major role in the last bull market and it’s highly likely that they will be integral in the market’s evolution in 2023.

item.title: Rewind 2022: A crypto roundup of the year and stepping into 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: While 2022 proved catastrophic for investors across traditional and crypto markets, the crypto ecosystem’s potential has shined through the cracks of inflation and centralized custody of assets.

item.title: Australia overtakes El Salvador to become 4th largest crypto ATM hub
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: El Salvador’s position as the fourth-largest crypto ATM hub was short-lived as Australia stepped up its game over the following months.
